title: Private coaching classes, student‘s mess in an independent building or part of building upto100 sq
clause_text: Private coaching classes, student‘s mess in an independent building or part of building upto100 sq.m. subject to separate parking facility in the same premises.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Private coaching classes, student‘s mess in an independent building or part of building upto100 sq.m. subject to separate parking facility in the same premises.
